title: Ristorante il Melangolo
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant housed in a stand alone building with nice dining set up. Many standard appetizers for Italian food and pizza - some lacto-vegetarian, a few vegan including a vegan soup, plus also a mushroom menu. Try the Tuscan vegetable and the fresh pici pasta with garlic and tomato. The contorni (5 or 6) is all vegetarian and vegan.
